word: The meetings held in Monterey for the children were, I think, the best . . . of any which we attended. . . . All began to seek the Lord and to inquire, What shall I do to be saved? All those who wanted to be Christians were invited to occupy the front seats, which by request, had been vacated. Here was a cross for the young. We knew if they could take this first step they would gain strength to take the next. . . .
